name: Hot Buttered Rum Apple Cider
description: A hot drink for cool nights. For holiday parties, make it in Epicure Multipurpose Pot or a crock pot – it smells wonderful!
preparation: Simmer apple cider or juice for 5 minutes.
Add Hot Buttered Rum, stirring until melted.
Pour into 6 glasses, and add 1 or 2—1 oz shots of rum to each. Stir and serve.
tips: Switch out rum and use bourbon for a change.
Add spirits to glasses individually to leave a great non-alcoholic option for guests.
